mapper.select: SELECT scr.score_val_str, cts.score_max, cts.critics_name_eng, scr.score_name, scr.score_year FROM t_package pkg INNER JOIN t_product prod ON prod.product_id = pkg.product_id LEFT JOIN t_wine_vintage_score scr ON scr.wine_id = prod.wine_id AND scr.vintage_tag = prod.vintage_tag LEFT JOIN t_critics cts ON scr.wine_critics_id = cts.wine_critics_id WHERE pkg.package_id =#{packageId}
